Minimalism and Brutalism

  • Motherfuckingwebsite
  • Brutalist Web Design
  • https://www.uxbrutalism.com/
  • https://www.nngroup.com/articles/brutalism-antidesign/

While brutalist design is in many ways refreshing, minimalism seems to be more the thing that I want to do here. But some of the “restrictions” of Brutalist Web Design are still reasonable to adhere to (they chime well with the message of the Motherfuckingwebsite.
